title: Aston Sci. on LinkedIn: Breast Cancer Vaccine Shows Promise in Early Human Trial
description: Check out how the cancer vaccine works and its potential to revolutionize breast cancer prevention and treatment! "The vaccine helps the immune system detect...
cleaned_text: Check out how the cancer vaccine works and its potential to revolutionize breast cancer prevention and treatment! "The vaccine helps the immune system detect and destroy any remaining cells — helping prevent recurrence of the cancer." -Mary
